article.class: fl-post post-112 page type-page status-publish hentry

div.p: Please find all communications and updates regarding COVID-19, school closures, and ongoing resources at our BPS Communications Portal. Please contact the school directly with any questions. Thank you and we will get through this together.

Welcome to Citizens Leadership Academy, Cleveland's first expeditionary learning middle school. Located in the Hough / University Circle neighborhood, we serve students grades 6-8 through an innovative combination of real-world learning, community engagement, and academic excellence. We'd love to have you as part of the CLA family!

h1.span: Preparing a community of civically engaged citizens

div.p: Citizens Leadership Academy is Northeast Ohio's first Expeditionary Learning middle school. In and out of the classroom, hands-on learning is an essential part of our curriculum. Every year, we focus on "essential questions" and dig deep into issues that matter to our community. Our mission is to prepare our students to lead in academics, service, and civic engagement during high school, college, and beyond.
CLA has high academic and behavioral expectations that promote a sense of ambition, personal responsibility, and a “no excuses” attitude in our students.

At CLA, there is a strong emphasis on student ownership of academic achievement and habits of leadership. The resulting school culture makes school a joyful place, rooted in consistency and positivity. The CLA school culture also lays a strong academic and leadership foundation for our students to succeed in high school, college, and beyond.
Citizens Leadership Academy serves middle school students in grades 6-8. Learn more about enrollment opportunities for the upcoming school year.
Citizens Leadership Academy is a top-rated, tuition-free public charter school. Want to learn more?
We are located in the University Circle / Hough neighborhoods, near E 97th & Chester. Come in for our next Open House to see the school!
Our hands-on, expeditionary approach to learning has changed the way our students learn and interact with our city.

Our public school is open to all students and families, regardless of ability, socioeconomic status, IEPs, or other factors. We have students from throughout Cleveland attending. We would love to welcome you to our school community!
If you would like to learn more about Enrolling your child, please visit our Enrollment Page here, or contact our enrollment number: (216) 367-5720. Thank you so much for your interest in our school!

Join 107.9 DJ Ro Digga for this completely free event! Get your child(ren) ready for the winter season with free winter gear, free haircuts and braids, snacks, community resources, and school supplies (while supplies last).

p.span: Interested in enrolling and/or learning more about our schools? Book a personal tour at any of our seven campuses in Cleveland today!

div.h3: "This is a total game changer for middle school students in Cleveland, Ohio."
div.div: CLA was recently featured on Channel 19 for being named a Verizon Innovative Learning School -- one of only three middle schools in the entire state! Watch the video to learn more about this innovative program.

h1.span: Ready to Take the Next Step?

div.p: Our school is public and open to all families, but we do have limited spaces due to our small class sizes. To secure your child's spot for next year, consider taking action sooner rather than later. Thanks for your interest!
Visiting our school is one of the best ways to see if CLA is right for you and your child. Get to know us by touring our school and meeting staff and families.
Ready to start your child's application? Great! Get started here. You can save your account as you go, and always contact us with any questions.

img.alt: Citizens Leadership Academy is a Breakthrough School in Cleveland, Ohio
img.title: Citizens Leadership Academy is a Breakthrough School in Cleveland, Ohio

div.p: Citizens Leadership Academy is a member of Breakthrough Schools, the #1 rated network of public charter schools in Ohio (CREDO at Stanford University). Breakthrough Schools is a group of mission-driven schools committed to providing Cleveland-area families with distinct educational options. Learn more at BreakthroughSchools.org

p.strong: Explore all of our elementary and middle schools:
